version_description:
1.New mode
Open the Rank Battle, match by rank
No more merit in the Random Battle
Cancel the Train Battle
2.Battle system
Increased preview and shot display for submarine torpedo
Optimization of ship's turret firing range and torpedo shooting range
The endurance loss rate of submarine after oxygen depletion is reduced by half
3.Warships and research
research interface can preview exclusive painting
4.Supply Crates adjustment
5.Add New coating product in shop
6.Japanese language support
7.Other
Items get prompts interface to increase tips display function.
Fix problems that can't be shared.
Fix time zone problem

2.2 version update content:
1 Combat optimization
◆ Redo battle income calculation (including silver coins, battleship experience, sailor experience, sailor proficiency), the battle income is more stable.
◆ Combat bonus increases combat medal, used to open the battle supply box.
2 Adjust the battle supply crate
◆ Open conditions changed to collect battle medals.
◆ Three kinds of combat supply crates are changed into one type, and 3 can be obtained every day.
◆ Significantly increase the output of the battle supply crate, including silver coins, gold coins, accessories, sailors, sailors guide.
3 Heavy crate increases the guarantee mechanism, up to 10 times must get Lv5 Equipments.
4 Sailors adjustment
◆ Adjust sailor recruitment
   Normal Voucher is changed to Primary Voucher, you can get one B sailor, the price is changed to 40,000 silver.
   Normal 5times Voucher is changed to Intermediate Voucher, and one B-A sailor can be obtained. The price is changed to 20 gold.
   Normal Voucher is changed to Advanced Voucher, and 2 A-S sailors can be obtained at the same price.
   Normal 5times Voucher is changed to Super Voucher, you can get 2 S-SS sailors, the price is changed to 2000 points.
◆ Simplify the sailor skill reset interface, and reset does not change the skill quality.
◆ The maximum number of sailors increased to 100
◆ Sailor guide price reduced by 50%
5 Adjust the rank upgrade award.
6 Adjust the novice seven days reward.
7 Adjust the commander upgrade reward, level 4 reward lv3 battleship [Michigan].
8 replace the new port.
9 fix the bug of sound loss.

1. New Port Effect.
2. Reward of Rank Battle increased by 30%, and silver reward of expedition decreased by 50%.
3. All premium warships can be purchased from Tech Tree.
4. Adjust packages, warships, camouflages, sailors and equipments in malls.
5. New Camouflage: Space battleship · Montana, Glory · Shimakaze.
6. Adjust the attributes of some equipments.
7. Replace Loading pictures.
8. Fix known bugs.

1. Optimization of projectile jumping mechanism
2. Refresh mechanism for use of commercial city sailors and accessories
3. Festival port
4. H41 and Raytheon new space warship coating
5. The new open N3 plan of science and technology tree, Xuefeng, enterprise, Phoenix, avant-garde, Richelieu, Stalin, Veneto and other gold warships, and the mall also has corresponding warship gift package
6. Add Korean language

1. Balance adjustment:
The speed of all warships has been reduced by 10%, and the speed of all shells and torpedoes has been reduced by 10%.
The rotation speed of the main turrets of the battleship was greatly accelerated.
Slightly increased the endurance and weapon damage of Premium ships. Now they will be 110% as much as standard ships.
2. Improve the display of ship status, now it can display various attributes more accurately.
3. At the end of the 17 rank battle season, merit will be reset to 400.
4. Improve the description of the Sailor system.
